docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 16 (AP) -- A tiring Mrs. Babe Zaharias hung on gamely today to beat Betty Jameson by a stroke for the $1,000 first prize at the National Capital women's open golf tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 16 (AP) -- A tiring Mrs. Babe Zaharias hung on gamely today to beat Betty Jameson by a stroke for the $1,000 first prize at the National Capital women's open golf tournament.

headline.main: CAPITAL GOLF GOES TO MRS. ZAHARIAS; Her One-Under-Par 299 Nips Miss Jameson by Stroke -- Miss Suggs Third

docs.snippet: Renewed strength developed in the British pound sterling following the announcement on Thursday of the lowering of the bank rate by the Bank of England. Canadian dollar moved erratically in a market that lacked any large turnover in business.

docs.snippet: PARIS, May 18 (UP) -- Budge Patty and Gardnar Mulloy, the only seeded Americans to see action, led seven other United States players into the second round in men's singles today as the French tennis championships began at the Roland Garros Stadium in...
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, May 18 (UP) -- Budge Patty and Gardnar Mulloy, the only seeded Americans to see action, led seven other United States players into the second round in men's singles today as the French tennis championships began at the Roland Garros Stadium in cold, windy weather.

docs.snippet: GUATEMALA, May 23 -- The consensus here among Guatemalans and foreigners alike is that the United States has chosen the wrong issue in seeking a showdown with Guatemala over her purchase of arms from behind the Iron Curtain.

docs.snippet: Following is a country-by-country survey by correspondents of The New York Times of governmental and international programs of technical cooperation and assistance in seventy-nine lands. The statistical data have been compiled from reports of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Following is a country-by-country survey by correspondents of The New York Times of governmental and international programs of technical cooperation and assistance in seventy-nine lands. The statistical data have been compiled from reports of the several administrations. Totals are given for the last two fiscal or calendar years. United Nations totals are contingent upon payment of pledged contributions. Domestic contributions reported cover in most cases only part of recipient's expenditures.
docs.abstract: NY Times survey of US, UN and other tech aid
